attributes.action: Repeal the recent Bill introduced placing MPs outside of the Freedom of Information Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should not be above outside of a law which was introduced to improve democracy and the public's right to information.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FOI-act/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
